programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something strange is happening in Toyland – trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.desc: Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Phoebe convinces the Tooth Fairy to visit before Marcus has actually lost his tooth, the Dew Drops do everything in their power to make sure the tooth is out before she arrives! / The Dews decide to hold a concert in the park for their animal friends, but can’t find the time to practice.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: When Tip takes over Kyle's job as "King of Police," she removes all rules from Boovsland and it descends into chaos; Tip and Oh accompany DieAnne to Roidian Prom

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: On a Koobish cattle drive together, Tip and Krunkle's differences result in Oh and the herd getting lost in a stampede; Tip and Oh can't agree on how to celebrate their Friendiversary

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Fed up with the rowdy FAST crew, Chet challenges them to go without racing; Skid and Shadow must defend the clubhouse alone against Clip and Clap.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Burn is forced to coach a lousy tetherball team -- and gets inspired by an old rival; White Shadow's karate skills are tested by a ninja stinkbug.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Sherman accidentally swaps a class project with a dinosaur egg that hatches on stage, so Peabody must help to send it back before it ruins the show

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something strange is happening in Toyland – trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch play Scooch’s favorite board game outside, using the whole town of Pawston as the board. \Tag thinks it’s time for an update to the Pawston City Anthem, which inspires a city-wide music competition where competitors will create and perform new Pawston anthems.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the Dews' Glitter Guide, Willow comes to check on the Dews’ progress, they feel like they’re failing to impress her, until Lola gets locked out of the apartment during a game of Hide-and-Seek and Dews work together to get her back inside. / When the Dew Drops discover a time capsule in the park, they set out to find the mystery owner.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Phoebe convinces the Tooth Fairy to visit before Marcus has actually lost his tooth, the Dew Drops do everything in their power to make sure the tooth is out before she arrives! / The Dews decide to hold a concert in the park for their animal friends, but can’t find the time to practice.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Tag and Scooch’s first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tag’s old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure – climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That? (S1)

programme.desc: In the first of a four episode event we're calling SUPERSIZED, four smiths must salvage steel from a massive railroad track to make their signature big blades.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S1)
programme.desc: 100 years ago, shipping packages was slow, and shipping overnight was impossible, until two Seattle brothers risk everything to reinvent shipping packages for all.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: While the team continues to chase the elusive tunnel in the Money Pit, evidence that the swamp was used for an off-loading operation abounds, and new clues on Lot 5 point to Captain Phipps.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: While Gary and Rick uncover unprecedented finds in the swamp, the team finally reaches depth in the Garden Shaft, and their probe drilling operation delivers thrilling results immediately.

programme.desc: Rene Belbenoit, a petty thief, is captured and sent to France's notorious penal colony in French Guiana. He determines to escape or die trying. His story becomes the basis of several popular movies.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch (S1)

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14)

programme.title: How Disney Built America

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: The miners of Iwami Ginzan worked in darkness, risking their lives for fortune and glory. The area once produced quantities of silver yet had little impact on the beauty of the surrounding mountains.

programme.title: OKINAWA: US Influences
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: US Influences.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 20, Day 8 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: NHK WORLD-JAPAN Special program
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a wide range of programs from news, current affairs, documentaries, etc. focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Today: making small talk with a client. Raphael Marso, from Germany, works at a company that makes manufacturing equipment. He takes on a roleplay challenge to help improve his Japanese skills.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: A popular tourist train in Kyushu's Takachiho area is powered by fuel made from leftover ramen soup! Starting from zero, trucking company owner Nishida Masumi developed his own biodiesel.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Documentary 360
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship documentary series offers must-see episodes on politics, the economy, social trends, science and the environment in Japan and beyond.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Tomorrow's Manga Masters
programme.desc: Ten rookie manga creators from around the world have assembled in a small town in southwestern Japan. We follow their daily struggle to become world-class manga creators.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION
programme.desc: This episode features the hit mystery-entertainment series The Apothecary Diaries. We hear from the author and visit the anime studio to uncover the secrets behind its rich world and characters.

programme.title: Story Land in Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: TAKE TECH
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: Haku. (an Osaka-based four-piece band praised for their unique lyrics and sound) and XinU (a smoky-voiced singer with a sound that blends diverse elements).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-16.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Yushima is a cat island only four kilometers around. Hungry cats gather at the port for fresh fish, including a talkative kitten. A cat lives at the local school and watches over the eight students.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: NINJA TRUTH #29
programme.desc: A ninja group known as the Hayamichi-no-mono operated in the northern Hirosaki Domain for about two hundred years. We examine the role they played and the unique martial arts they practiced.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig’s boat for a day on the river. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.desc: Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes.

programme.desc: Get ready to crash and bash, 'cause today is the SUPER SMASH RACE! But when Crusher cheats and sends Zeg and Blaze far away, it's up to Blaze to help Zeg get back to the race.

programme.desc: When Digi & Tal's space vacuum breaks it's up to the pups to save Mayor Humdinger from falling space debris. Humdinger's Cuckoo Clock goes out of control.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 01
programme.desc: Gather 'round for a most hackful holiday celebration, as Brooke and Kevin demonstrate how to navigate any holiday office party like a pro Elf, and explain how the ball drop became a New Year's tradition.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 02
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke hack their way through the worst obstacles an airport has to offer, and viewers share their DIY solutions for whipping up cream. Plus, Brooke and Kevin find out how low prices can go if you're a "good guy."

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 03
programme.desc: Skip a trip to the spa with a facial hack you can find in any schoolkid's book bag, and learn how to treat yourself like it's your birthday - any day of the year. Plus, Brooke and Kevin go for a swim… in a garbage bag.

programme.title: Arrow S2 10
programme.desc: After a fight with Cyrus Gold (aka the Acolyte), Oliver is drugged and left for dead. Determined to save him, Felicity's cure causes Oliver to hallucinate, and confront his past.

programme.title: Arrow S2 11
programme.desc: Oliver confronts a new threat when bombs start to go off in Starling City...planted by a man named Shrapnel, who's next targeting Sebastian Blood's Unity Rally.

programme.title: Arrow S2 12
programme.desc: When Laurel asks the Arrow to investigate Sebastian Blood, Oliver is unsure whether to believe her accusations. But when they get too close to the truth, Blood strikes back.

programme.title: Arrow S2 13
programme.desc: Arrow offers to train Roy so he can learn to control his newfound super-strength. But, Roy refuses to listen unless Arrow reveals his true identity, which Oliver refuses to do.

programme.title: Arrow S2 14
programme.desc: As Laurel continues to unravel, Oliver & Lance try to convince Sara to stay in Starling city and reunite with Laurel and their mother -- but the League of Assassins wants Sara back

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 7
programme.desc: In a Mexican restaurant, Michael treats incredulous diners to a good luck serpent with their tableside guacamole, and makes salsa so spicy it melts metal. Then, he confuses office coworkers with a never-ending brown bag lunch and a frozen meal thatturns out to be alarmingly fresh. Plus, he confounds his new assistant with some tricks of the trade as a real estate agent, including freshening dead flowers right before her eyes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 8
programme.desc: Michael mystifies laundromat patrons by impossibly multiplying miniscule amounts of detergent, and makes one man's day when he convinces him that he's hit the coin machine jackpot. Then at a thrift store, Michael taps into his musical abilities by turning into a human record player. Plus, as an employee at a shipping store, he astonishingly flips a full bowl of punch without spilling a drop and repeatedly teleports a glass penguin to one customer's dismay.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 6
programme.desc: Let the revelry begin as 20 of the most boneheaded partiers throw down. From twerking babes to an overzealous Willie Nelson fan and a drunken keg stand you can't un-see. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of comics, including Brendon Walsh, KevinMcCaffrey and Jaime Andrews

programme.title: Arrow S2 15
programme.desc: As Oliver brings Sara into the team, Felicity starts to feel left out. To prove her worth, she goes after a villain named William Tockman, a.k.a. The Clock King (ROBERT KNEPPER).

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 05
programme.desc: Officers Mack and Jack crash a failed football-viewing party, Kevin and Brooke use an important hacker's tool to secure a restaurant reservation, and it's mom versus dad in a race to determine peanut butter & jelly supremacy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 05
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q hop behind the register at a burger joint and then head to a department store where they have only themselves to blame. And tonight's big loser gets into a rigged elevator only to find his own worst nightmare.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Extraordinary Animals - Episode 8
programme.desc: Eccentricity abounds in one of the planet's most isolated and unique ecosystems. This episode examines some of the most eccentric Australian animals showing that being a bit odd works out for these creatures.

programme.title: Fancy Fruit - Plenty of Persimmons
programme.desc: Have you eaten a persimmon? If you haven't, you're not alone. And it's a sometimes-misunderstood fruit. Where better to go to learn that a Queensland orchard celebrating a record crop.

programme.title: Black Snow - Unfinished Business
programme.desc: In Ashford, residents gather at the local high school to unearth a time capsule from the 'class of 94'. Among the items is a letter from Isabel Baker who was murdered just a week before the time capsule was buried.

programme.title: Living With Fire - Fire Power
programme.desc: Although Australia is shaped by fire and flood, bushfires are a man-made phenomenon. Historian and author Bill Gammage explains Australia could better deal with fire risks by understanding how Aboriginal people used it.

programme.title: Alone Australia - Episode 3
programme.desc: Ten survivalists are dropped into the West Coast Ranges of Tasmania for the challenge of a lifetime: to survive in the wild without any human contact.

programme.title: Loving Gluten Free - Episode 3
programme.desc: Helen honours her Greek roots with a gluten free recipe for 'Lamb Pastitsio'. Kathy Tsaples, founder of 'Sweet Greek', shares her recipe for savoury tarts that have a delicious polenta pastry base.

programme.title: The Streets Hong Kong - Episode 1
programme.desc: Dan Hong explores Hong Kong, learning how its history and culture has shaped the local food scene, while scouring the streets and markets to find out how these traditional dishes are made.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 23
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 24
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel cover the week in sport including the First Test between the Wallabies and the British and Irish Lions, plus the World Swimming Championships in Singapore, AFL, NRL, Super Netball, cricket and more.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 22
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 144
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 144
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 144
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Crispy and Crumbed
programme.desc: Tonight, Adam and his guests, comedian Frida Deguise and chef Sam May, have fun with all things crispy and crumbed.

programme.title: This Place - The Significance of the Waterways to Wangal People
programme.desc: Wangal people know Sydney as the place of eel Dreaming and before it was known as the Parramatta River, the waterway was called Burramattagal. Join Uncle Jimmy Smith on a tour of Sydney's significant parks and waterways.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Episode 12
programme.desc: Foreign Correspondent returns to capture the complex international picture. This season we investigate Russia's new Cold War in Europe, Mexico's crack down on the fentanyl trade, and the impact of mass tourism in Europe.

programme.title: First Weapons - Returning Boomerang
programme.desc: In South Australia, host Phil Breslin, weapon maker Moogy Sumner and our team of experts unpack the science of Australia's most iconic and scientifically complex weapon - the Returning Boomerang.

programme.title: Culture By Design - Culture
programme.desc: Design is a reflection of history, heritage and identity. This episode explores cultural roots that influence modern design with a wood block printer in Bangalore, fashion designer in Jakarta and furniture designer in Mumbai.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations - Blackburn
programme.desc: With two transformations on one site, builder Dylan tries to retrofit a draughty cottage into a fully sustainable home while landscape architect Tylah's plans for a garden oasis are battered with financial constraints.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 126
programme.desc: Ahead of the return of Parliament tomorrow, Patricia Karvelas brings you the latest in federal politics and national affairs live from Canberra, speaking with key frontbenchers and newly-elected members of parliament.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 126

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: Lara Croft (Jolie) is back in action and faces her most perilous mission: to recover what ancient civilization believed to be the essence of all evil, Pandora's Box.

programme.title: Flash Gordon
programme.desc: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series Of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: A Columbia graduate student unknowingly gets caught up in a terrifying nightmare masterminded by a Nazi fugitive. Lawrence Olivier was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Paper Man
programme.desc: As the police investigate a gang murder case, another mysterious paper man murder happens, and the suspects get killed one by one. Continuing to track the clues of the case, the police finally unveil a hidden secret and tragedy over two generations.

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan 2
programme.desc: Haunted since childhood, orphan Azlinda believes her torment stems from her parents' dark history. Her friends Zurina, Wati, and Ustaz join forces to end her suffering, but a malevolent demon interrupts their efforts. Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Planete Rap
programme.desc: Ably-hosted by Fred Musa on Skyrock, ''Planete Rap'' sets the standard when it comes to rap programmes in France. Thanks to an innovative, fully-optimised system, discover the television adaptation of the radio format that regularly attracts hundreds of thousands of listeners!

programme.title: Fort Boyard 2024, Toujours Plus Fort !
programme.desc: With Claude Dartois, Pascal Bataille, Lorene Vivier, Marine Lorphelin, Mario Barravecchia, Maelle, for ARSLA (Association for Research into Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Guadeloupe, La Colere Dans La Joie
programme.desc: Martine Delumeau had long observed Guadeloupe, island of her parents' birth, from Metropolitan France... But everything suddenly became much closer as the film-director watched the images filmed by Guadeloupians during the 2009 general strike. A look back at forty-four days of industrial action, unique and powerful.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Saint-George, Le Mozart Noir
programme.desc: Also known as the ''Black Mozart'', the Chevalier de Saint-George was one of the most brilliant figures of 18th century Europe. An extraordinary violinist, adored orchestral conductor, he composed several operas and a number of lyrical works before sinking back into oblivion. A look back at his career.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel
programme.desc: Our trek along the Via Idra continues from Campo Tencia to the Alpe Sponda mountain hut, and a spot of high altitude fishing! Then on from the Sponda hut to that of Cognora, in the Valle Verzasca and an opportunity to admire the Pizzo Barone.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Abers Road
programme.desc: Gaetan Roussel couldn't leave Brittany without meeting Alan Stivell, an iconic figure of Breton music. The musician talks with emotion about his childhood and his career during a Celtic journey between Langonnet, Gourin, Huelgoat, the Arree Mountains and Lake Guerledan.

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade
programme.desc: Clemence takes Marine and Jean-Sebastien to explore the Orne. The young farming couple f jointly launched an innovative project: straws made from organic rye.

programme.title: Ca Pousse Au Fenua
programme.desc: The resources of the Polynesian agricultural world are numerous and varied. For some, they are even considered as true treasures. Travel to discover these lands rich in flavors and know-how.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco
programme.desc: Benjamin has transformed a desecrated chapel in Reims into a home, while preserving the soul of this historic site.

programme.title: Thiaroye 44
programme.desc: What happened on 1 December 1944 at the Thiaroye military camp in Senegal? West African soldiers, only just repatriated from the front, came under fire from French machine guns. Nearly 80 years later, three young artists from this Dakar suburb want to understand the reasons behind the massacre.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Chef Leila Albert makes a chocolate and cumin mille-feuille.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade
programme.desc: Clemence takes Marine and Jean-Sebastien to explore the Orne. The young farming couple f jointly launched an innovative project: straws made from organic rye.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness
programme.desc: Tobias rallies the woodcutters to his cause and together they march towards the Crater.

programme.title: Silence, Ca Pousse !
programme.desc: On the programme: the creations of Emma Bruschi; plant anomalies; the Parc Floral de Paris; ''Pas de panique'' in the garden of Marie-Christine and Fred.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Monde De Jamy
programme.desc: Extreme phenomena and unique experiences, on land, on sea or in the air, Jamy Gourmaud takes us on his scientific expeditions by transmitting us his thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: In the heart of the Marais district in Paris, the National Archives Museum hosts works dating back several centuries. French designer and architect Herve Van der Straeten opens the doors to his workshop. Style by Alessandro Michele for Valentino. We meet up with ceramic artist Alison Thirion.

programme.title: L'annee Du Requin
programme.desc: Maja, member of the Landes maritime police force, is reluctantly nearing retirement. But the disappearance of a holidaymaker has the entire coast on alert: a shark has been seen in the bay! Helped by her young colleagues Eugenie and Blaise, Maja seizes the opportunity for one last case.

programme.title: Au Revoir Jerome !
programme.desc: Newly arrived in heaven, Jerome sets off in search of his wife. He gradually finds himself falling ever-deeper into a colourful but totally surrealist world where no-one seems able to help him.

programme.title: Donovan S'evade
programme.desc: Donovan, a bodyguard, is given the job of protecting the wife of a government minister, on holiday with friends. In doing so the young man discovers a life to which he has never been entitled.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Leon has returned to his former home with his grandfather. Francis comes clean with his son and tells him everything he needs to know about the relationship between Marianne and Violette.

programme.title: Six Degres
programme.desc: Leon and Florence are now officially an item, but Leon isn't as demonstrative as his girlfriend would like. Francis helps Leon to track down Violette.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 2
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Brush ep 3
programme.desc: Alex becomes a famous makeup artist because of her mother’s unique brush set but will face a challenge when all her clients begin to die, one by one.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 10
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 2
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 2
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 6
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 55
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 40
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: For the Love ep 3
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Barrio Kulimlim ep 1
programme.desc: Family and fate intertwine in this dark story of old rituals and a parallel shadow universe where sacrifices of blood ensures that the small town of Quatro Santo remains wealthy and prosperous. A mother and daughter with old ties return to the place where their ancestors once tried to flee, only to find themselves trying to escape a darker destiny.
